title: Council Bluffs grandparents stunned to discover boy's injury was from bullet, not fireworks
content:
COUNCIL BLUFFS — Jim Riddle couldn’t figure out why his 7-year-old grandson wouldn’t come back outside to watch the neighborhood fireworks show.
It was about 10:30 p.m. Saturday, and Leyton McNabb was nowhere to be found as the fun was getting started.
